item.title: Our next epicon meeting
item.description: Thymine/Uracil (6K-148), Dpt. of Molecular Biology - For those attendees who do not have access to the MolBiol building, probably the best way to enter would be via the staircase node I on floor 1. That door will be open for keyless entry. The entrance is located at the Northern side of the MolBiol (6K building), faces...
